wikipedia_page.main:
David Lorrimer (16 January 1865 – 12 November 1925) was an English cricketer.  Lorrimer was a right-handed batsman.  He was born at Leicester.
Lorrimer made his first-class debut for Leicestershire against Warwickshire in 1894 at Grace Road (a match in which his brother, Alexander, also made his first-class debut).  He made eight further first-class appearances for the county, the last of which came against Dublin University in 1895.  In his nine matches he scored 194 runs at an average of 12.12, with a high score of 46.He died at Boscombe, Hampshire, on 12 November 1925.
